mapper.insert: insert into user_account (username, hashed_password, nickname, email, created_at, updated_at) values (#{username}, #{hashedPassword}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: select * from user_account where email = #{email} and id != #{id}
mapper.update: update user_account set preferences = #{preferences}, updated_at = NOW() where id = #{userId}
